channel.title: Acid Blitz HyBrid Client (317, 503 and 508) 1.8k views!
channel.description:
[size=40pt]Acid Blitz HyBrid Client (317, 503 and 508)[/size]
This client really is simplicity at its best. The whole Point of this server is to merge all your RSPS clutter into one simple Client. Thats why i stuck a 317, 503 and a HD 508 Server Together
[size=20pt][b]Credits:[/b] [b]40% Adamp40 (Acid Blitz Client and Putting it together)[/b] [b]30% Umair (For 503 IP Changer) I think :confused:[/b] [b]30% barrage scape (Josh) (508 HD IP Changer)[/b][/size]
This is Great for Lazy People
[b]The 317 is Acid Blitz Client V1- (Better GameFrame - No blue crap this time)[/b] Havn't really done much except change Gameframe (Includes Cache)
[b]The 503 is a simple client with cache included and IP Changer[/b]
[b]The 508 is Josh's HD 508 Client IP Changer (Closed Source)[/b]
Titana Cache is required to run the HD 508- Download- http://www.megaupload.com/?d=WIM2S072 More Info- http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,327545.0.html
Package Comes with "Server Tools" This is just a Package from another source
Pictures:
[img]http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/chooseclient.JPG[/img]
[img]http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/317.JPG[/img]
[img]http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/503.JPG[/img]
[img]http://www.fileden.com/files/2008/4/1/1847192/508.JPG[/img]
Donwload: (79.37 MB)- Sorry its big but it has 2 caches inside
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ojx112gtyym http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ojx112gtyym http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ojx112gtyym
Please Download and Comment
I do not take any responsibilty for other peoples work included in the download
[b]Update: I May make a V2 of this that will have a IP Prompt at Startup and it will send packets to the server and if the response is successful it will load the required client. Now all i need is to find out what the server responses for a 317, 503 and 508 are. If i crack that you wont even need to think about what verison you want![/b]
